abstract.text: Logs events from the upstream
to the console.

with the provided value.

and handles them using the provided closure.

up to a specified number of times while applying a transformation on error.
A namespace for grouping related AsyncSequence operations.
Collects all received elements, and emits a single array of the collection when the upstream sequence finishes.

and handles them using the provided throwing closure.
Raises a fatal error when its upstream sequence fails, and otherwise republishes all received input.
